Interest Rate¶

The python name for the module is interestrate and can be imported as below:

import faspy.interestrate as fir

or:

from faspy import interestrate as ir

The following are list of submodules available:

  • Discount Curve
  • Fixed Income Instruments
    • Date Construction
    • Coupon Structures
    • Valuations
